item.title: Prioritization & Productivity
item.description: Overview Time Management Fundamentals Benefiting from Prioritizing Becoming More Productive: Prioritizing and Managing Time Actionable Why ! I wan’t to build a weighted system for prioritizing task and activities. Overview We’ll talk about prioritizing your tasks so you are working on the most important, highest return tasks first and moving away from working on things you really shouldn’t work on. Time Management Fundamentals Introduction If we just manage our time, but haven’t prioritized what we need to do, we could find ourselves being very efficient working on the wrong things.
